rules.content: It has “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.”
It has "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color."
-X: Sacrifice up to X artifacts. If you do,{lns}search your library for up to that many basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped under your control. Then shuffle.

tags.setting: In a bustling marketplace garden, a determined figure sorts through baskets of vegetables looking into the camera, while behind them fertile fields stretch toward a quaint village.
